column2: Reach the next Holy Mountain within 60 seconds to be greatly rewarded.\nGain a random curse if you lose.
Become infused with the power of explosions.\nOnly works if you are NOT immune to explosions.
Become infused with the power of electricity.\nOnly works if you are NOT immune to electricity.
Become infused with the power of fire.\nOnly works if you are NOT immune to fire.
Teleport to safety upon reaching critical (but not 0) health.
The wand in your hand gains a strong mana boost.\nIt can no longer be tinkered with.
Opening cursed chests heals you.\nThey also become easier to find.
You are freed from all curses.
The gods have an odd sense of humour...
Gold nuggets gravitate away from you.
Wands have a chance to overheat below half mana.
Wands have frustratingly little sense of rhythm.
Being on the ground too long causes solids to turn into lava.
Gain random bursts of x5 move speed.
Chests roll for loot twice.\nYou obtain a random curse.
A dubious mixture of healthium and some pitch-black liquid…
Increases fire rate while mana is high
Drastically speeds up your entire wand at the cost of more recharge time
Makes your wand slightly more efficient
Pushes your wand to its limits; may cause overheating
Increases a projectile’s damage based on missing mana
A fast and lethal piercing shot
A piercing shot that casts another spell upon collision
Drains organic creatures of their life force
A harmless bolt that casts another spell upon collision
The softer fruit of recursive doom
The softest fruit of the most recursive doom
Raises a wall to separate spaces
Right-click to raise a wall in front of you
Right-click to fully restore your wand's mana
